The plant typically grows as a shrub, reaching heights of up to 1 meter, with lance-shaped leaves that are often covered in fine hairs. It thrives in well-drained soils and is often found in coastal and sandy environments. Due to its ornamental value, it is cultivated in gardens and botanical collections.
